name: TheHive 5 Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when TheHive events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 TheHive 5 Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when TheHive events occur

notice.displayName: You must set up the webhook in TheHive — instructions here
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: You must set up the webhook in TheHive — instructions here

events.name: events
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Events | 作用: Events types | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
available_options: * (值: *) - Any time any event is triggered (Wildcard Event)
Alert Created (值: alert_create) - Triggered when an alert is created
Alert Deleted (值: alert_delete) - Triggered when an alert is deleted
Alert Updated (值: alert_update) - Triggered when an alert is updated
Case Created (值: case_create) - Triggered when a case is created
Case Deleted (值: case_delete) - Triggered when a case is deleted
Case Updated (值: case_update) - Triggered when a case is updated
Comment Created (值: comment_create) - Triggered when a comment is created
Comment Deleted (值: comment_delete) - Triggered when a comment is deleted
Comment Updated (值: comment_update) - Triggered when a comment is updated
Observable Created (值: observable_create) - Triggered when an observable is created
Observable Deleted (值: observable_delete) - Triggered when an observable is deleted
Observable Updated (值: observable_update) - Triggered when an observable is updated
Page Created (值: page_create) - Triggered when an page is created
Page Deleted (值: page_delete) - Triggered when an page is deleted
Page Updated (值: page_update) - Triggered when an page is updated
Task Created (值: task_create) - Triggered when a task is created
Task Updated (值: task_update) - Triggered when a task is updated
Task Log Created (值: log_create) - Triggered when a task log is created
Task Log Deleted (值: log_delete) - Triggered when a task log is deleted
Task Log Updated (值: log_update) - Triggered when a task log is updated

filters.name: filters
filters.description: Filter any incoming events based on their fields
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 作用: Filter any incoming events based on their fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: values (值: None)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: outputOnlyData (值: None) - Whether to output data with additional details and omit headers
